brand_identity.name: MUJ Campus Marketplace
brand_identity.mission: A premium, curated marketplace for Manipal University Jaipur students to buy, sell, and trade campus essentials.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and product names. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for descriptions, UI labels, and metadata. Relaxed line-height.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=Outfit:wght@400;600;700;900&display=swap');

usage_rules.backgrounds: Use deep gray/black (#030712) as the main canvas. Avoid pure black.
usage_rules.cards: Use Glassmorphism: bg-gray-900/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10.
usage_rules.text: Headings in White (#f8fafc). Body in Slate-400 (#94a3b8).
usage_rules.ctas: Primary Gradient for main actions. Hover states should increase brightness/glow.

layout_system.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for sections. Gap-6 to Gap-8 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-600 to-blue-600 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.5)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 text-white rounded-full px-6 py-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-gray-900/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-violet-500/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1
cards.category: rounded-xl bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-800/50 to-gray-900/50 border border-white/5 p-6 hover:border-violet-500/30 transition-all cursor-pointer

inputs.style: bg-gray-950/50 border border-white/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-white focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-violet-500 transition-all placeholder:text-gray-600

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients in the background (violet/blue) to create depth behind glass cards.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use framer-motion for entrance animations (fade-up) and hover effects (scale-up).
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent.routing: Use React Router DOM. Create a layout wrapper that handles the Navbar and Footer.
instructions_to_main_agent.state: Use Context API for Auth and Cart/Wishlist management.
instructions_to_main_agent.critical_rule: Do NOT use solid white backgrounds. Always use the dark theme palette defined above. Use the 'glass_surface' for all containers.
instructions_to_main_agent.file_structure: Keep components in /src/components/ui (shadcn) and /src/components/custom (your custom marketing components).

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry. Use noise textures if possible.
universal_guidelines.interaction: Every button must have a hover state. Every page transition should be smooth.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high (White on Dark Gray). Use aria-labels for icon buttons.
